content:
New-AzureRmAvailabilitySet

Creates an Azure availability set.

Syntax

New-AzureRmAvailabilitySet [-ResourceGroupName] <String> [-Name] <String> [-Location] <String>
 [[-PlatformUpdateDomainCount] <Int32>] [[-PlatformFaultDomainCount] <Int32>] [-Managed] [-Sku <String>]
 [<CommonParameters>]

Description

The New-AzureRmAvailabilitySet cmdlet creates an Azure availability set.

Examples

Example 1: Create an availability set

PS C:\>New-AzureRmAvailabilitySet -ResourceGroupName "ResourceGroup11" -Name "AvailabilitySet03" -Location "West US"

This command creates an availability set named AvailablitySet03 in the resource group named ResourceGroup11.

Parameters

-Location

Specifies the location for the availability set.

Type:String
Required:True
Position:3
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Managed

Managed Availability Set

Type:SwitchParameter
Required:False
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Name

Specifies a name for the availability set.

Type:String
Aliases:ResourceName, AvailabilitySetName
Required:True
Position:2
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-PlatformFaultDomainCount

Specifies the platform fault domain count.

Type:Int32
Required:False
Position:5
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-PlatformUpdateDomainCount

Specifies the platform update domain count.

Type:Int32
Required:False
Position:4
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-ResourceGroupName

Specifies the name of a resource group.

Type:String
Required:True
Position:1
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Sku

The Name of Sku

Type:String
Required:False
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False

Related Links

  • Get-AzureRmAvailabilitySet
  • Remove-AzureRmAvailabilitySet
